body.p: The undersigned citizens of Boyle County would respectfully petition yr. excellency the Governor of Ky to remit a fine imposed on William Yates for keeping a tippling house we believe it is a case for the interposition of yr excellency -- The fine was imposed at the august term 1864 of the Boyle Circuit Court & is for $60 --
